t: A Psalm{H4210} of David{H1732}, to bring to remembrance{H2142}{(H8687)}. O LORD{H3068}, rebuke{H3198}{H8686)} me not in thy wrath{H7110}: neither chasten{H3256}{H8762)} me in thy hot displeasure{H2534}.
For thine arrows{H2671} stick fast{H5181}{(H8738)} in me, and thy hand{H3027} presseth me sore{H5181}{H8799)}.
There is no soundness{H4974} in my flesh{H1320} because{H6440} of thine anger{H2195}; neither is there any rest{H7965} in my bones{H6106} because{H6440} of my sin{H2403}.
For mine iniquities{H5771} are gone over{H5674}{(H8804)} mine head{H7218}: as an heavy{H3515} burden{H4853} they are too heavy{H3513}{H8799)} for me.
My wounds{H2250} stink{H887}{(H8689)} and are corrupt{H4743}{H8738)} because{H6440} of my foolishness{H200}.
I am troubled{H5753}{(H8738)}; I am bowed down{H7817}{H8804)} greatly{H3966}; I go{H1980}{H8765)} mourning{H6937}{H8802)} all the day{H3117} long.
For my loins{H3689} are filled{H4390}{(H8804)} with a loathsome{H7033}{H8737)} disease: and there is no soundness{H4974} in my flesh{H1320}.
I am feeble{H6313}{(H8738)} and sore{H3966} broken{H1794}{H8738)}: I have roared{H7580}{H8804)} by reason of the disquietness{H5100} of my heart{H3820}.
Lord{H136}, all my desire{H8378} is before thee; and my groaning{H585} is not hid{H5641}{(H8738)} from thee.
My heart{H3820} panteth{H5503}{(H8773)}, my strength{H3581} faileth{H5800}{H8804)} me: as for the light{H216} of mine eyes{H5869}, it{H1992} also is gone{H369} from me.
My lovers{H157}{(H8802)} and my friends{H7453} stand{H5975}{H8799)} aloof from{H5048} my sore{H5061}; and my kinsmen{H7138} stand{H5975}{H8804)} afar off{H7350}.

They also that seek{H1245}{(H8764)} after my life{H5315} lay snares{H5367}{H8762)} for me: and they that seek{H1875}{H8802)} my hurt{H7451} speak{H1696}{H8765)} mischievous things{H1942}, and imagine{H1897}{H8799)} deceits{H4820} all the day{H3117} long.
But I, as a deaf{H2795} man, heard{H8085}{(H8799)} not; and I was as a dumb man{H483} that openeth{H6605}{H8799)} not his mouth{H6310}.
Thus I was as a man{H376} that heareth{H8085}{(H8802)} not, and in whose mouth{H6310} are no reproofs{H8433}.
For in thee, O LORD{H3068}, do I hope{H3176}{(H8689)}: thou wilt hear{H6030}{H8799)}, O Lord{H136} my God{H430}.
For I said{H559}{(H8804)}, Hear me, lest otherwise they should rejoice{H8055}{H8799)} over me: when my foot{H7272} slippeth{H4131}{H8800)}, they magnify{H1431}{H8689)} themselves against me.
For I am ready{H3559}{(H8737)} to halt{H6761}, and my sorrow{H4341} is continually{H8548} before me.
For I will declare{H5046}{(H8686)} mine iniquity{H5771}; I will be sorry{H1672}{H8799)} for my sin{H2403}.
But mine enemies{H341}{(H8802)} are lively{H2416}, and they are strong{H6105}{H8804)}: and they that hate{H8130}{H8802)} me wrongfully{H8267} are multiplied{H7231}{H8804)}.
They also that render{H7999}{(H8764)} evil{H7451} for good{H2896} are mine adversaries{H7853}{H8799)}; because I follow{H7291}{H8800)} the thing that good{H2896} is.
Forsake{H5800}{(H8799)} me not, O LORD{H3068}: O my God{H430}, be not far{H7368}{H8799)} from me.
Make haste{H2363}{(H8798)} to help{H5833} me, O Lord{H136} my salvation{H8668}.
